description: Cyndi Lauper tours a theme park, meeting strange characters and remembering her past. The film is also illustrated by a collection of Cyndi's pop videos, like "Girls Just Want To Have Fun" and "Sally's Pigeons".
name: Cyndi Lauper: 12 Deadly Cyns... and Then Some

original_info.id: Cyndi Lauper: Twelve Deadly Cyns ...  and Then Some_2000
original_info.name: Cyndi Lauper: Twelve Deadly Cyns ...  and Then Some

review.name: greatest video collection around
review.reviewBody: This is a MUST for Cyndi Lauper fans! It is about time a video collection was put out! I know for years I was waiting(since 1984) and nothing was ever put out until 1995). All the videos are there, and a few rarely seen videos (Who Let in the Rain, Thats What I think, Sally's Pigeons, and The World is Stone). However, and few important ones were left out: Hole in My Heart, The Goonies R Good Enough (parts one and two), and My First Night Without You. Boy Blue wasn't included, but it was just a concert clip from Cyndi Lauper in Paris, which a TRUE fan would own already anyway! I just wish they would put this collection on DVD! That would be great, especially if they included those extra videos I mentioned! But a definite must for any fan of Cyndi or pop culture in general! ENJOY
